segments.text: Hi Barbara . Have you lost weight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi Julie . Yeah . I've been on a diet for a couple of months now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What type of diet were you on ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I joined a health club and my trainer gave me tips on eating . With a combination of eating better and exercising , I managed to lose 15 pounds in 2 months .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's amazing . What tips did your trainer give you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mostly on how to exercise , but the best advice I got was changing my eating habits . Instead of eating 3 times a day , she told me to eat 5 times a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That doesn't make sense . If you eat more , than how do you lose weight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually , I'm eating the same amount . I eat 5 smaller meals a day . Basically , it naturally speeds up the metabolism and helps to burn fat at a faster rate .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That makes sense . I'm going to try that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don't need to lose weight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a little gut I have been trying to get rid of .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ah ... but remember to incorporate a little exercise into your diet .
segments.speaker: S2
